DOC.brief_title: A Multiple-Dose Study Oral Oseltamivir Participants Hemodialysis ( HD ) Continuous Ambulatory Peritoneal Dialysis ( CAPD )
DOC.criteria: Adults great equal ( > /= ) 18 year age ESRD define residual renal function creatinine clearance ( CrCl ) less ( < ) 10 milliliter per minute ( mL/min ) Well establish HD CAPD therapy period 3 month stable CrCl < 10 mL/min Body mass index ( BMI ) 18 34 kilogram per metersquared ( kg/m^2 ) Use contraception among woman childbearing potential Clinical significant comorbid disease terminal illness Known human immunodeficiency virus ( HIV ) hepatitis B C History drug alcohol abuse within prior year Donation loss > /= 400 milliliter ( mL ) blood 3 month prior Screening Participation clinical study investigational drug 3 month prior study drug Pregnant lactating woman
